author: jochen
msg: Seconds in Duration are now splitted into an integer part (seconds) and a long part (millis)

author: jochen
msg: xs:dateTime, xs:date, and xs:time are now parsed and formatted as specified by XML Schema

author: jochen
msg: Fixed property name from "packageName" to "package", for compatibility with the RI.

author: jochen
msg: Fixed docs of Ant task: One has to use jaxmeapi.jar and not the JAXB jar files.
